title: Apocalypse

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Ignite all doused targets at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Igniting will deal an Unstoppable attack to all doused players.
- If you are the last Underworld player alive, gain roleblock immunity.
- After igniting, you must wait two nights.

desc:
Post 336
*The smell of smoke never failed to satisfy you, and it was easy to get lost in a mesmerizing flame.*
Detection Immune
Conversion Immune
Control Immune
